about_the_game:
Near Site is a survival horror game where you adventure through the wilds in order to discover a mysterious relic. Evade various creatures that will stalk you as you solve puzzles and gather clues. The most terrifying part, however, is you damaged your glasses in the initial crash and you are severely near sighted....


  • Explore 5 different locales in the wild from a thick forest to an abandoned asylum.
  • Search for clues to help you solve puzzles and unlock the way forward.
  • Salvage items to help you survive. Fashion a tool to open a door. Craft or repair your glasses to restore your vision. Create medicine to heal your wounds.
  • Evade deformed predators that are determined to hunt you down. Outsmart them using the environment, stay hidden, or use your other senses to stay safe.

content_descriptors.notes: There will be inferred acts of violence and gore as well as creatures that could be of a disfigured nature.  Psychological themes that could portray horrific nuances or situations may also be present.
